hero.title: A Heritage Built on Consistency Since 1895
hero.subtitle: What began as a small family bakery has grown into a standardized, scalable brand.

story.lead: WMB Fırın has operated as a continuously evolving operational system since 1895. Today, we work with standardized processes that guarantee the same quality and taste at every branch.

paragraph1.title: Origins (1895)
paragraph1.content: We started as a small family business in Istanbul. In the early years, we established fundamental principles that prioritized customer satisfaction and ensured consistency in every production.

paragraph2.title: Commitment to Process Consistency
paragraph2.content: Beyond tradition, we developed operational processes that ensure every product meets the same quality standards. Recipes were standardized, production procedures documented, and quality control systems established.

paragraph3.title: Modern Franchise-Ready Operation
paragraph3.content: Since 1995, we established central production facilities, standard training programs, and operational systems to become franchise-ready. Today, every new branch can open while maintaining the same quality level.
